titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Social Security Act to clarify rules for determining whether certain agent-drivers and commission-drivers are employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 4/7/2003--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to revise rules applied in determining whether certain agent-drivers and commission-drivers are employees.
